items.title: Bulk deals: Porinju Veliyath's portfolio buys 0.51% stake in Greaves Cotton
items.description: Investi Global Opportunity Fund PCC - Cell bought 1.1 lakh shares in Identical Brains Studio for an average price of Rs 53.51.

items.title: ITC demerger: ITC Hotels shares to be listed on BSE, NSE on January 29
items.description: Last year, ITC decided to demerge its Hotel business into a separate listed entity to unlock value for shareholders. It fixed the demerger ratio at 1:10, which meant that shareholders holding 10 shares of ITC, as on January 6, 2025, will receive one share of ITC Hotels post the demerger.

items.title: Top gainers and losers today: Stocks that moved the most on January 27
items.description: The Sensex closed 1.08% lower at 75,366.17, while Nifty dropped 1.14% to 22,829.15.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty below 22,850, Sensex down 824 points; IT, media worst hit
items.description: BSE Midcap index fell 2.7 percent and smallcap index slipped 3.5 percent. All the sectoral indices ended in the red with Media index being down 4.7 percent. IT index shed 3.4 percent while oil & gas, metal, consumer durables, pharma and energy were down 2 percent each.

items.title: Live: What’s next for investors? Decoding Budget, US Fed decision | Closing Bell
items.description: Markets start Budget week on a weak note. Broad-based selloff weighs on markets. Sensex, Nifty shed 1% amid mixed global cues. Catch Lovisha Darad & Yatin Mota in conversation with Sunil Subramaniam, Market Expert to navigate market movement.

items.title: LT Foods share plunges 9% on dismal Q3 earnings show
items.description: The decline in LT Foods' Q3 net profit was driven by a surge in expenses, including higher raw material costs, increased finance costs, and a rise in employee benefit expenses compared to the same period last year.

items.title: Agri Picks Report January 27, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, The sowing of rabi crops in Andhra Pradesh has progressed to 1.5 million hectares as of Wednesday, up 18.1% on year from 1.3 million hectares sown in the corresponding period last year, according to a report released by the state's agriculture department.

items.title: Laurus Labs assures no 'significant impact' of AIDS relief funding halt by Trump 2.0
items.description: "If at all there may be funding challenge, the Company reasonably believes it will not affect the procurement of medications," said Laurus Labs.

items.title: Omaxe shares soar 4% on collaborative project plan with Rs 5,000 crore revenue potential
items.description: The initiative will eye Joint Ventures, collaboration and development through Public-Private Partnerships (PPP) in spaces where infrastructure gaps exist, and can potentially drive socio-economic growth.

items.title: Buy ICICI Bank; target of Rs 1470: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on ICICI Bank has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1470 in its research report dated January 27, 2024.

items.title: DAM Capital shares soar 12% after firm reports 144% surge in Q3 net profit
items.description: The homegrown investment bank's total income saw a massive rise in Q3, jumping 132 percent on-year to Rs 104 crore in Q3 FY25

items.title: Indigo shares gain over 1% after Q3 results surpass brokerage estimates
items.description: Majority of brokerages maintain cautious stances, with several reiterating 'HOLD' or 'REDUCE' ratings due to concerns about capacity growth, rising fuel costs, and intense competition.

items.title: Budget Snapshot: Can the Budget help change the market trend?
items.description: Market volatility, as indicated by the India VIX index, typically rises before the budget and sharply declines afterward.
